DDMLiterals.ControlLock.Label: Control lock
DDMLiterals.ControlLock.Description: Lock the controls to prevent unintended use of the appliance

DDMLiterals.Notifications.Description: Start or stop notifications for individual notifications at any time
DDMLiterals.SabbathMode.Label: Sabbath mode
DDMLiterals.SabbathMode.Description: Sets the appliance to remain in a non-disturbing state during Sabbath. The interior lights will turn off and audio is silenced
DDMLiterals.MaxCool.Label: Max cool
DDMLiterals.MaxCool.Description: Accelerates the cooling process for your refrigerator
DDMLiterals.MaxIce.Label: Max ice
DDMLiterals.MaxIce.Description: Accelerates the ice making production for your refrigerator. This setting will not operate until the Ice Maker is turned on
DDMLiterals.AutoNightLight.Label: Auto Night Light

NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Name: Smart Energy
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Description: Use Smart Delay to delay your fridge from using the defrost cycle during peak energy hours.

DoorOpenAlert.Name: Door Open Alert
DoorOpenAlert.Description: Receive a notification if the refrigerator door is left open for more than 5 minutes.

MaxCool.Name: Max Cool
MaxCool.Description: Receive a notification when the referigerator's Max Cool starts and stops

MaxIce.Name: Max Ice
MaxIce.Description: Receive a notification when the refrigerator Max Ice starts and stops

OverTemp.Name: Over Temperature Alert
OverTemp.Description: Receive a notification if your refrigerator temperature rises over selected temperature

PreventativeMaintenanceAirFilter.Name: Air Filter Alert
PreventativeMaintenanceAirFilter.Description: Recieve notification when it’s time to check the status of the air filter or produce preserver.

WaterFilter.Name: Water Filter Alert
WaterFilter.Description: Receive a notification when it's time to order & replace the water filter for the refrigerator.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Refrigerator door alarm is sounding. Check that the door is closed and/or items aren’t blocking the door.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Refrigerator door alarm is sounding. Check that the door is closed and/or items aren’t blocking the door.
NotificationContents.PushText: Refrigerator door alarm is sounding. Check that the door is closed and/or items aren’t blocking the door.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It's just about time to replace your refrigerator's water filter, order now.Once the water filter is replaced, flush the water system as described in the Use & Care Guide before using the dispenser. You should also discard the initial (3) batches of ice.
